events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred on April 30th involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision involving the car.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to begin processing and communicate further steps with the customer.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance company and the customer received confirmation email.
We requested additional documents including photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all required documents promptly including detailed photos of the damaged vehicle and police report.
The investigation into the auto accident circumstances and liability has been initiated by the claims department.
Investigation completed and liability confirmed in favor of the customer based on all collected evidence.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover the cost of repairs and associated expenses related to the accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated timely communication and support.
The claim was approved following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal after thorough review.
Payment was issued to the customer's designated account promptly as per approved settlement terms.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully following completion of all related administrative steps.
All documents and correspondence related to the claim were archived for future reference and audits.
